system.benefit:
You can create magic rods. Crafting a rod takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its base price. To craft a rod, you must use up raw materials costing half of its base price. See the magic item creation rules in Chapter 7 for more information.

You can also mend a broken rod if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the raw materials and half the XP it would take to craft that rod in the first place.
